article.title: Recommended titles on programming and software engineering

authorblurb.para: Centrum voor Wiskunde en Informatica, Amsterdam, The Netherlands

section.title: Introduction
section.para: Sometimes a book or an article can really influence the way we think about and manage Meta-Environment software. This is a very incomplete list, so please help to complete it.

listitem.para: Code Complete (2) - Steve McConnel (on Software Construction in general, on a low level of abstraction, full of best-practices and hard facts)
The Pragmatic Programmer - Andy Hunt, Dave Thomas
The inmates are running the asylum: Why High Tech Products Drive Us Crazy and How To Restore The Sanity - Alan Cooper

section.title: Suggestions
section.para: Meta-Environment programmers are invited to add suggestions here.
